EmailTemplate.name: 17.CloudAA.XLE.webXLE.N.G.N.9898.XLE Gamechanger (Refresh).Email 7 - Managing dy
EmailTemplate.subject: Managing dynamic workloads in an OpenStack world
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
${preheader} View as web page <[[{{system.viewAsWebpageLink}}]]> Practical know-how based on industry experience Hi {{lead.First Name:default=edit me}},
Moving from a trial, to a real-world, OpenStack production environment means you’re already changing the game. Of course, as we all know, that’s not always easy.
Check out the TechTarget white paper, “Beyond the Trial: Taking OpenStack into Production”, to get insights on the challenges and solutions for managing dynamic workloads in complex, multiple data center environments. To learn more about Nokia IT solutions for large enterprises visit our OpenStack <[[https://networks.nokia.com/solutions/openstack]]> page.
Sincerely,
Michael Williams | Global Enterprise Marketing | Nokia
U.S. and Canada: +1 866-231-0264 (M-F 8:00 a.m. - 5:00 p.m. EST)Europe & Asia Pacific: + 44 203 582 5650 (M-F 8:00a.m.- 4:00p.m. GMT)Or use the How to Buy form <[[https://networks.nokia.com/how-to-buy]]> Connect with us © 2017 Nokia.
